fieldsets.content:
Cinderella Story Graphic Organizer

Feature

Description

Setting:
Where does your story take place?

{{2-2}}

Hero/Heroine:
Who is the hero or heroine of your story? Describe his or her character traits.

{{3-2}}

Villain:
Who is the villain of your story? Describe his or her character traits.

{{4-2}}

Problem:
What is the problem in your story?

{{5-2}}

What is the magical item?

{{6-2}}

Describe how the hero defeats the villain by using the magical item.

{{7-2}}

Closure:
How does the story end?

{{8-2}}

After you have planned your Cinderella story, think about doing the following tasks to make your story even more fun to read!
• Add dialogue between your characters.
• Share your story with a partner and receive feedback.
• Revise your story. Are there any changes you want to make?
• Think of a fun, descriptive title for your story.
• Do your characters have names? What names fit your characters best?

{{bottomPrompt}}
